decision_conditions: The proposed amendments cannot be accepted as non-material amendments to planning permission 193049FUL dated 07.10.2020 for 'Construction of four attached two storey dwellinghouses with loft accommodation' in accordance with Section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990) due to being contrary to the Ealing Council guidance for non-material amendments.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow change of initial heat source proposal of gas central heating boilers for each apartment, to individual air sourced heat pump units in relation to planning permission reference 193049FUL dated 07/10/2020 for 'Construction of 3 storey building with basement level to include 8 self-contained flats, provision of a rear communal garden and  associated forecourt  landscaping, parking, refuse storage facilities and cycle storage (following demolition of existing building)'
